title: Tl;dr
body: Lel do something about this guy, even though it's just his smurf account :)

replies.body: Looked up your game. If you're having a problem with a player in game being salty or abusive your correct course of action is to ignore them and report them afterwards. Reports DO have an effect, but adding the guy after the game to sling abuse back and forth does not.

I'd recommend you send in a support ticket about this [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Be sure to explain what happened in detail, and provide all the evidence you can.

> _**As a side note:**_
> This is naming and shaming, which is against board rules. It would be super helpful if you could remove his name from the post now, before a moderator has to get into it. Or take the post down entirely.
> 
> Thanks ;)

Yes, reports do have an effect,
that's why he could still message me a thousand messages about random stuff that i don't need :)
And if I make an effort to post it on the forum, I will get guilt trip by moderators.
Smart one ;)
This is why OCE server is seen as one of the most toxic server
Keep up the good work guys :D
P.S. he was the one who sent the friend request
